metadata.title: CVE-2017-9993 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: FFmpeg before 2.8.12, 3.0.x and 3.1.x before 3.1.9, 3.2.x before 3.2.6, and3.3.x before 3.3.2 does not properly restrict HTTP Live Streaming filenameextensions and demuxer names, which allows attackers to read arbitraryfiles via crafted playlist data.

criterions.comment: libav: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
